metadata.title: CVE-2019-17530 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1.0. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in AP4_PrintInspector::AddField in Core/Ap4Atom.cpp when called from AP4_CencSampleEncryption::DoInspectFields in Core/Ap4CommonEncryption.cpp, when called from AP4_Atom::Inspect in Core/Ap4Atom.cpp.

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
